message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
